body_html:
On Thu, Jul 20, 2017 at 2:56 PM, ebrevdo ***@***.***> wrote: Flakiness in custom_grad_test in bayesflow: FAIL: //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test (see /private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/testlogs/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test/test.log). INFO: From Testing //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test: ==================== Test output for //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test: .2017-07-20 21:06:37.116599: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use SSE4.2 instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations. 2017-07-20 21:06:37.116621: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations. FF... ====================================================================== FAIL: test_works_correctly (__main__.CustomGradientTest) ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Traceback (most recent call last): File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/kernel_tests/custom_grad_test.py", line 51, in test_works_correctly self.assertAllEqual(f(x_), fx_) File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 752, in assertAllEqual np.testing.assert_array_equal(b, a) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 813, in assert_array_equal verbose=verbose, header='Arrays are not equal') File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 739, in assert_array_compare raise AssertionError(msg) AssertionError: Arrays are not equal (mismatch 0.26%) x: array([ 5000. , 4998. , 4996.0004, ..., 4996.0004, 4998. , 5000. ]) y: array([ 5000. , 4998. , 4996.0004, ..., 4996.0004, 4998. , 5000. ]) ====================================================================== FAIL: test_works_correctly_both_f_g_zero (__main__.CustomGradientTest) ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Traceback (most recent call last): File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/kernel_tests/custom_grad_test.py", line 65, in test_works_correctly_both_f_g_zero self.assertAllEqual(f(x_), fx_) File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 752, in assertAllEqual np.testing.assert_array_equal(b, a) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 813, in assert_array_equal verbose=verbose, header='Arrays are not equal') File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 739, in assert_array_compare raise AssertionError(msg) AssertionError: Arrays are not equal (mismatch 0.26%) x: array([ 5000. , 4998. , 4996.0004, ..., 4996.0004, 4998. , 5000. ]) y: array([ 5000. , 4998. , 3.94262053e+03 3.60727387e+03 3.36841610e+03 3.26739790e+03 3.01536429e+03 2.05289301e+03 1.63910906e+03 1.53544112e+03 1.35487221e+03 9.66873815e+02 8.18264895e+02 5.54889022e+02 3.70734643e+01 2.21156729e+01 1.90163031e+00 3.70734643e+01 1.24371323e+02 4.96539353e+02 1.35487221e+03 1.63910906e+03 2.05289301e+03 2.86354713e+03 3.01536429e+03 3.26739790e+03 3.60727387e+03 3.97465614e+03] ================================================================================ @jvdillon <https://github.com/jvdillon>
Grr. Looks like some compiler is not IEEE754 compliant. Ill need to change assertAllEqual to assertAllClose. Sending out cl shortly.

body_text:
On Thu, Jul 20, 2017 at 2:56 PM, ebrevdo ***@***.***> wrote:
 Flakiness in custom_grad_test in bayesflow:

 FAIL: //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test (see /private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/testlogs/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test/test.log).
 INFO: From Testing //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test:
 ==================== Test output for //tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow:custom_grad_test:
 .2017-07-20 21:06:37.116599: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use SSE4.2 instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
 2017-07-20 21:06:37.116621: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
 FF...
 ======================================================================
 FAIL: test_works_correctly (__main__.CustomGradientTest)
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 Traceback (most recent call last):
   File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/kernel_tests/custom_grad_test.py", line 51, in test_works_correctly
     self.assertAllEqual(f(x_), fx_)
   File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 752, in assertAllEqual
     np.testing.assert_array_equal(b, a)
   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 813, in assert_array_equal
     verbose=verbose, header='Arrays are not equal')
   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 739, in assert_array_compare
     raise AssertionError(msg)
 AssertionError:
 Arrays are not equal

 (mismatch 0.26%)
  x: array([ 5000.    ,  4998.    ,  4996.0004, ...,  4996.0004,  4998.    ,
         5000.    ])
  y: array([ 5000.    ,  4998.    ,  4996.0004, ...,  4996.0004,  4998.    ,
         5000.    ])

 ======================================================================
 FAIL: test_works_correctly_both_f_g_zero (__main__.CustomGradientTest)
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 Traceback (most recent call last):
   File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/kernel_tests/custom_grad_test.py", line 65, in test_works_correctly_both_f_g_zero
     self.assertAllEqual(f(x_), fx_)
   File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/custom_grad_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 752, in assertAllEqual
     np.testing.assert_array_equal(b, a)
   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 813, in assert_array_equal
     verbose=verbose, header='Arrays are not equal')
   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy-1.11.2-py2.7-macosx-10.11-x86_64.egg/numpy/testing/utils.py", line 739, in assert_array_compare
     raise AssertionError(msg)
 AssertionError:
 Arrays are not equal

 (mismatch 0.26%)
  x: array([ 5000.    ,  4998.    ,  4996.0004, ...,  4996.0004,  4998.    ,
         5000.    ])
  y: array([ 5000.    ,  4998.    ,  4996.0004, ...,  4996.0004,  4998.    ,
         5000.    ])

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 Ran 6 tests in 0.376s

 FAILED (failures=2)
 not equal where =  (array([ 560,  753,  896,  958, 1117, 1796, 2137, 2229, 2397, 2801, 2977,
        3334, 4569, 4667, 4902, 5430, 5788, 6575, 7602, 7862, 8203, 8783,
